long_description: With its streamlined design and small volume, the Osprey Rev 12 Hydration Pack helps keep you hydrated and fueled up while you cover long distances quickly. Dedicated hydration compartment with direct zip access and integrated reservoir stabilization allows for easy loading and protects internal pack contents from spills. 2.5-liter Hydraulic LT Reservoir features welded chevron baffles to prevent barreling and reduce sloshing, while a detachable quick-connect hose allows for quick removal. Breathable, mesh-wrapped BioStretch(TM) harness, built in magnetic sternum clip and removal dual chest straps provide stability and comfort. Mesh-covered, perforated-foam BodyBelt delivers stable comfort; breathable spacer-mesh back panel provides a soft, irritation-free contact surface. Zippered stretch mesh BodyBelt pockets provide quick access to on-the-go essentials; shoulder-harness pocket with zippered bottle sleeve provides accessible storage. Zippered top slash pocket provides additional storage and organization options; stretch-mesh side pockets provide easily accessible external storage. Weatherproof media pocket provides quick access to your touch-screen device or GPS. The Osprey Rev 12 Hydration Pack features front-panel bungee compression for external storage.
short_description: With its streamlined design and small volume, the Osprey Rev 12 Hydration Pack helps keep you hydrated and fueled up while you cover long distances quickly.
